content: Â yahh i found out lot of albums in itunes msia are muchhhh CHEAPER than the USA.for example the cheapest in US is 7.99 usd for standard LP..and lots of songs in itunes msia are priced cheaper thn in the US. well it is due to malaysia lebels are less demading than USA label. u cant get a usd2 or 4 bucks album in USA itune..neverr..the US labels are hard on itunes.
